reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Thick and Soft
reviews.reviewText: I bought these in the king size. Once removed from the packaging and allowed to fluff up, these are very nice pillows! They're right there in between firm and soft, with a nice density that also has enough give that you feel supported but not like you're sleeping on a brick. My husband likes to fold his pillows to sleep, and these allow him to do that without being flat or underfilled like most foldable pillows are. They also look nice and fluffy on the bed, so they lend themselves to the comfy made bed aesthetic.Will definitely buy again when I need more pillows in the future!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love these pillows! Cushy With Good Medium-firm Support.
reviews.reviewText: Replaced my cheap 5 year old lumpy and flat pillows. Instant improvement in my sleep and they puff right back up in the morning. They are full and I would call them medium firm as they give good support yet are very soft and cushy. I highly recommend them!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great comfort and look for your money.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Longest lasting pillow I’ve ever had
reviews.reviewText: I bought these pillows in 2020. 3 years of daily use later, I was quite depressed and spent upwards of 20 hours a day in bed for about six months. THEY STILL DIDN’T LOSE THEIR SHAPE. I have four of them that get regularly rotated, which helps, but still! They’re nice and supportive, but fluffy enough to still be comfortable. My only complaint about them is the thick black line along the sides. I have white sheets and you can absolutely see the line, and it’s not necessary. At least turn it white to match the rest of the pillow!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The softest, best sleeping pillows I've yet to own.
reviews.reviewText: Having tried so many different pillow types, many that were billed as game changers that became flat and un-fluffable within a month or two, I'm very skeptical of claims where pillows are concerned. Buy sometimes price isn't indicative of quality. And that's the case with these. They arrived flat, packed with all the air sucked out them, like bags of freeze-dried coffee. They fluffed quickly though, and have turned out to be the plumpest pillows I've ever owned.Having used genuine down, various down alternatives, bamboo, copper, buckwheat, and who knows what was inside of some, this was my first memory foam pillow. Memory foam seems to be one of the fad products that companies think they can put into anything to make it sell, whether it's actually effective in that product or not. And I'm now pretty well convinced that using it in pillows was a very good idea. I don't know if it's entirely due to the pillows, but with these, I'm sleeping better than I have in years. I'm an all over sleeper, usually starting on my back, moving to one side or another an hour later, and eventually waking on my stomach, after tossing from side to side a few times during the night. I'm the type who can even work his way to his stomach when sleeping in a hammock or a recliner. I don't remember if I was ever able to make it through the night on my back when I was younger, but I almost did after a week or so with these pillows. I also have yet to wake up with a sore ear, due to sleeping on my side, unlike even the soft down pillows I've owned.The first night, it felt as if the back of my head almost sunk to the mattress. The pillows also didn't give me the support I'm used to for reading in bed. I feared I'd wasted 30 bucks. But then I was surprised at how long I stayed asleep that first night and even more amazed a week or so later when I awoke at 5am to discover I hadn't even turned once yet. I was still sleeping on my back! But with both pillows under my shoulders and head mind you, as I'd fallen asleep reading. For me that was quite surprising. And my nights have been some of the most restful I've had in years ever since. It's still hard to believe a pillow could make that much difference for someone who would still routinely fall into a deep sleep even on a hard concrete floor in his 20s and 30s. But, I'm confident these have made a significant difference.Another great thing is the complete absences of lumps or noticeable shifting of the filling. I don't use them without pillow cases, but they feel comfortable enough and well enough made to do so. It's only been a couple months, but if they're still this fluffy in a year as is claimed, I've found my new go-to pillows, or at least my pillow type, assuming the price hasn't inexplicably changed far exceeding reasonable rates of inflation in that time, as so many products on amazon do.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not right for me
reviews.reviewText: Pillows seem fairly well made but I did not like them. Too tall and never compacted down to a comfortable height. My head was just too high making it very uncomfortable. Ended up getting up at 3am and grabbing my old pillow.I am a side sleeper and straddle my pillow, if you sleep like this, this pillow my be too thick for you.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super soft and comfy
reviews.reviewText: These pillows are great. I've had neck injuries and finding a pillow that doesn't make my neck hurt was a pain, but these pillows make my neck feel great and would recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars LOVE this pillow!
reviews.reviewText: I’m a side sleeper that sometimes lays on my back. This pillow works for both. It’s absolutely amazing for a side sleeper - laying on my side, I don’t have to bunch up the pillow at all to keep my head and neck level - it’s perfect. On my back, I do have to make sure my shoulders are up on the pillow so that my neck stays level, but as long as I do that it’s very comfortable. I would buy again.

reviews.reviewTitle: FIXED THE HEIGHT PROBLEM SEE UPDATED REVIEW wasn't high enough for me
reviews.reviewText: Update to my earlier review. I solved the height problem by modified another pillow. I took some of the stuffing out of another pillow and placed it under the Meoflaw. Now the height is perfect and its a really comfortable pillow, Luv it. No problems, as advertised, great product, good quality. My wife luvs hers. it didn't work for me cos I couldn't get the right height for me..
Claims are true. Pillow maintains its shape and fluffs up like I've never seen in a pillow before. After trying hundreds of dollars in pillows in the last few years I finally found a decent pillow.
I find the stuffing moves to the top of the pillow while sleeping but a quick flip of the pillow and it is fine. Overall I like the pillow
What wonderful pillows. Like resting your head on a cloud.

reviews.reviewTitle: Say yes to these . So worth it .
reviews.reviewText: Awesome product , great price , fast shipping ! Love these pillows so far . Super fluffy only one nights sleep but felt well rested waking up this morning . ( the day after a hectic new years night ) so thats saying something lol .
